DOC.brief_summary: This study design define amount duration cholesterol lower assess safety tolerability different dose regimen LY3015014 participant high cholesterol . The study also investigate body process drug drug affect body . Participants remain stable diet continue take cholesterol-lowering medication ( statin without ezetimibe ) . After sign informed consent document , participant complete screening/run-in period last 8 week . Then , treatment period last approximately 16 week . After treatment period , participant complete follow-up period last approximately 8 week total study duration range approximately 25 32 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study LY3015014 Participants With High Cholesterol
